ISSUE.TITLE: UPS plugin should check for exception
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In 3.90, I see you've updated the USPS plugin to handle an exception during DoRequest: string responseXml = ""; try { responseXml = DoRequest(_uspsSettings.Url, requestString); } catch (Exception exc) { response.AddError(string.Format("USPS Service is currently unavailable, try again later. {0}",exc.Message)); return response; } I think you should do same for UPS. (FedEx already does it.) Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/46455/ups-plugin-also-should-check-for-exception.aspx
